Title: Relates to including used vehicles in the drive clean rebate program
Summary: Relates to including used vehicles in the drive clean rebate program; provides that such rebate for a used vehicle shall not exceed one thousand dollars.
LawCode: Amd Part AA ยง1, Chap 58 of 2016
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part AA of chapter 58 of the laws of 2016, relating to establishing a zero emissions vehicle and clean burning fuel vehicle rebate program, in relation to including used vehicles in the drive clean rebate program
